forms.title: Sponsor Application Form

[step_start step_start-1] [section_break section_break-202 "Sponsorship Request"] Lets get started [/section_break] [custom_html custom_html-337]

[/custom_html] [step_end step_end-1] [step_start step_start-2] [step_end step_end-2] [step_start step_start-3] [step_end step_end-3] [step_start step_start-4] [address* address-377 format:international required_fields:line1|city|state|zip|country] [step_end step_end-4] [step_start step_start-5] [step_end step_end-5] [step_start step_start-6] [step_end step_end-6] [step_start step_start-7] [submit "Submit"] [step_end step_end-7]

_mail.subject: [_site_title] "[your-subject]"
_mail.body:
From: [your-name] [your-email]
Subject: [your-subject]

Message Body:
[your-message]

-- 
This is a notification that a contact form was submitted on your website ([_site_title] [_site_url]).

_mail_2.subject: [_site_title] "[your-subject]"
_mail_2.body:
Message Body:
[your-message]

-- 
This email is a receipt for your contact form submission on our website ([_site_title] [_site_url]) in which your email address was used. If that was not you, please ignore this message.

_messages.mail_sent_ok: Thank you for your message. It has been sent.
